title: Summary of COVID-19 vaccination among residents - King County, Washington
cleaned_text: Summary of COVID-19 vaccination among King County residents Updated weekly on Wednesday This dashboard shows how many people have been vaccinated for COVID-19 and progress towards equitable vaccine delivery across all racial and ethnic groups and regions of the county. Download COVID-19 vaccination data files The [Download the data page](https://kingcounty.gov/en/legacy/depts/health/covid-19/data/download.aspx) offers downloadable Excel files that contain COVID-19 data for King County. [Return to the COVID-19 data dashboards page](https://kingcounty.gov/en/legacy/depts/health/covid-19/data.aspx) [View the dashboard on a web-enabled mobile device](https://tableaupub.kingcounty.gov/t/Public/views/COVIDVaccinePublicDashboardV2/OverallCoverage?:showAppBanner=false&:display_count=n&:showVizHome=n&:origin=viz_share_link&:isGuestRedirectFromVizportal=y&:embed=y) (phones and tablets) Share our page at [kingcounty.gov/covid/data/vaccination ](https://kingcounty.gov/en/legacy/depts/health/covid-19/data/vaccination.aspx) Select the down-arrow icon at the bottom-right of the dashboard for other formats Use the tabs along the top to navigate the dashboard. Hover your cursor over the dashboard to view details about the data.
